title.earnCashback: Pssst... with FLIZ, you earn cashback when you pay. See why ‚Üí
title.feeFree: Payment methods charge high fees. FLIZ is fee-free and companies share their savings with cashback.
title.protection: Moreover, FLIZ offers the best protection for your payments and your data.

step.login: Log in with your new account

title.confirmationInstructions: Please enter the confirmation code we just sent to your email. Can‚Äôt find it? Check your spam folder.
title.pinCreation: We‚Äôre enhancing your login experience by replacing passwords with PIN authentication. Please verify your email and create a secure PIN in the next step.

title.info: This transaction is confirmed. It may take up to 24 hours for money to arrive on the bank account. If a transaction occurs over a weekend, the processing time may be up to 72 hours.

title.congratulations: Congratulations, your account has been created.

title.paymentsClarification: With FLIZ, your money takes no detours through various middlemen. All payments go directly from your bank account to the recipient, without us ever touching your money.

title.payWithFliz: Pay with your bank using FLIZ
title.selectingInstructions: Select your bank from the list of most popular banks or search for your bank.
title.searchingForBank: If you didn't find your bank, please use the search bar.

title.connectionInstructions: Login with your bank & choose your account for payments
title.loginDetailsInstructions:
Please use the same login details you use for your online banking. After continuing, you may be asked to confirm this onboarding in the app of your bank. 
In order to make payments easy for you, your online banking login details are securely stored on your device, outside the Fliz app. They are never shared with or accessible to Fliz Pay GmbH, its employees, or any third parties.

title.chooseTAN: Choose the TAN method you‚Äôd like to use
title.TANClarification: You have more than one active TAN app or method. For example, your bank‚Äôs TAN app may still be active on an old phone. Most likely, the last choice is your currently active TAN method (and yes, the names may be weird üòµ‚Äçüí´).

title.chooseAccount: Choose the account you‚Äôd like to use for FLIZ payments
title.correctIban: Please click on the IBAN you‚Äôd like to use. Make sure you use a current account. For example, don‚Äôt choose a savings account.

title.question: Sure you want to log out?

title.TANInstructions: If you didn‚Äôt receive a push notification from your bank, please manually open your bank‚Äôs TAN app, check your SMS, or use your chipTAN generator. You receive the TAN in whichever method you have agreed upon with your bank.

text.multiple: This link can be used for multiple payments and never expires.
